title: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity-Building Program for Creative Product Design Learning Tools (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design theory and basic understanding of instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Emphasizing project-based learning tool development competencies for pre-service teachers in fashion design, food nutrition, and beauty fields to effectively deliver product design education

learning_goals: Learners can create product design project guidelines reflecting industry-specific characteristics (fashion, food, beauty)
Learners can design performance assessment checklists using smartphone-based tools and develop applicable evaluation rubrics
Learners can produce teaching-learning materials integrating hard skills (design techniques) and soft skills (entrepreneurial competencies)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
